---
title: "Grading Policy"
---


- Quizzes: 48%
    - 16% each
    - Best 3 out of 4
    - If you miss a single quiz for any reason, there will be no makeups
---

- Assignments: 44%
    - 4 or 5 assignments
    - Done in groups of ~~5~~ **6** (preferred) or **7**
    - Atleast one question per assignment will be a project-like question
    - Variable weight (e.g. some assignments would be 10%, some 12%, etc.)
    - Some assignments would involve:
        - Making pull requests to public repositories
        - Writing Hugging Face Spaces like demos
---

- Attendance: 8%
    - <= 3 absences: 8%
    - 4 or 5 absences: 7%
    - 6 or 7 absences: 6%
    - 8 or 9 absences: 4%
    - 10 or 11 absences: 2%
    - 12 or more absences: 0%
